import { useSelector,useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import {useEffect} from 'react'; import { Link , useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import { HeartIcon, EmojiSadIcon, UploadIcon, UserIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/outline"; import { MailIcon, EyeIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import { userProfileAction } from "../../../redux/slices/users/usersSlices"; import { DateFormatter } from "../../../utils/DateFormatter"; export default function Profile() { const {id}=useParams(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); //console.log(id) //fetch user profile useEffect(() => {dispatch(userProfileAction(id));},[id,dispatch]); //page vanishing //user data from storeData const users=useSelector(state=>state.users); console.log(users); const {profile, loading, appErr, serverErr}=users; console.log(profile, loading, appErr, serverErr);// undefined in all return ( <>
{/* Static sidebar for desktop */}
{/* Profile header */}

{profile?.fisrtName} {/* {profile?.accountType} */} {/* Display if verified or not */} Account Verified Unverified Account

{profile?.posts.length} posts{" "} {profile?.followers.length} followers{" "} {profile?.following.length} following

{/* Who view my profile */}
